AKSEN.IS.summary: Aksa Enerji Ãretim A.S., an independent power producer, produces and sells electricity in Turkey and Africa. The company produces energy from coal, fuel oil, biogas, natural gas, wind, and hydroelectricity. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 7 power plants with a total installed capacity of 1,946 MW. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Aksa Enerji Ãretim A.S. is a subsidiary of Kazanci Holding A.S.

AKSUE.IS.long_name: Aksu Enerji ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
AKSUE.IS.summary: Aksu Enerji ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the operation of hydroelectric power plant in Turkey. It produces and distributes hydroelectric power. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Isparta, Turkey.

AYDEM.IS.summary: Aydem Yenilenebilir Enerji A.S. operates as a renewable energy company in Turkey. It operates hydroelectric, wind, geothermal, and biogas power plants with a capacity of 1,020 megawatts. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Merkezefendi, Turkey.

BIOEN.IS.long_name: Biotrend Cevre ve Enerji Yatirimlari Anonim Sirketi
BIOEN.IS.summary: Biotrend Cevre Ve Enerji Yatirimlari Anonim Sirketi engages in the solid waste management and energy production activities in Turkey. It operates biogas and biomass facilities with an installed power capacity of 55,781 MWe. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ESEN.IS.summary: Esenboga Elektrik Ãretim A.S. invests in solar energy sector in Turkey. The company owns 30 solar power plants with a capacity of 33.79 MWp. It also provides EPC services for solar power plants. The company is based in Ankara, Turkey. Esenboga Elektrik Ãretim A.S. is a subsidiary of Naturel Yenilenebilir Enerji Ticaret A.S.

GWIND.IS.summary: Galata Wind Enerji A.S. operates wind and solar power plants. The company was formerly known as GY Enerji Danismanlik Poje MÃ¼hendislik Ãretim, Ticaret ve Sanayi Limited Sirketi and changed its name to Galata Wind Enerji A.S. in January 2012. Galata Wind Enerji A.S. was founded in 2006 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. As of April 23, 2021, Galata Wind Enerji A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Dogan Enerji Yatirimlari Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.

NATEN.IS.summary: Naturel Yenilenebilir Enerji Ticaret A.S. engages in the generation of electricity from renewable energy sources in Turkey. It engages in the establishment of electricity generation plants, operation of the established power plants, and trade of the generated electrical energy. The company owns and operates solar power plants with total unlicensed generation capacity of 44.07 MWp. It also provides renewable energy contracting EPC services, including power plant site location and licensing, project development and engineering, land acquisition, meteorological measurement, turnkey renewable power plant installation, transmission and distribution network engineering and contracting, and network connection services, as well as switchyards, substations, and distribution centers engineering and contracting services; and supplies power plant components. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

PAMEL.IS.summary: Pamukova Yenilenebilir Elektrik Uretim A.S. engages in the construction and operation of power plants in Turkey. It operates a 6,744 MW hydroelectric power plant. The company was formerly known as Bomonti Elektrik Muhendislik Musavirlik Insaat Turizm Ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Pamukova Yenilenebilir Elektrik Uretim A.S. in December 2020. Pamukova Yenilenebilir Elektrik Uretim A.S. was founded in 2007 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
